###  git (linuxubuntu)

 ubuntu  apt 

``` bash
$ sudo apt install git -y
```
 Centos  apt  yum 

``` bash
$ git --version
```



###  git config 

 ubuntu git
``` bash
$ apt install build-essential nghttp2
$ apt install libnghttp2-dev
$ apt install libssl-dev
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

Post.title: init hexo
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

wget https://nodejs.org/download/release/v15.14.0/node-v15.14.0-linux-x64.tar.gz

###  nodejs 

``` bash
$ wget https://nodejs.org/download/release/v15.14.0/node-v15.14.0-linux-x64.tar.gz
```

nodejs: [nodejs](https://nodejs.org/download/release/v15.14.0/)

### 

``` bash
$ tar -zxvf node-v15.14.0-linux-x64.tar.gz
```

: [hicairo](https://www.hicairo.com/)

### 

``` bash
$ cp -r bin/* /usr/local/bin/
$ cp -r lib/* /usr/local/lib/
$ cp -r include/* /usr/local/include/
```

nodejs: [localhost](http://localhost:4000/)

### hexo

``` bash
$ node --version
$ npm --version
$ npm install -g hexo
```

: [hexo v](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

wget https://nodejs.org/download/release/v15.14.0/node-v15.14.0-linux-x64.tar.gz

###  nodejs 

``` bash
$ wget https://nodejs.org/download/release/v15.14.0/node-v15.14.0-linux-x64.tar.gz
```

nodejs: [nodejs](https://nodejs.org/download/release/v15.14.0/)

### 

``` bash
$ tar -zxvf node-v15.14.0-linux-x64.tar.gz
```

: [hicairo](https://www.hicairo.com/)

### 

``` bash
$ cp -r bin/* /usr/local/bin/
$ cp -r lib/* /usr/local/lib/
$ cp -r include/* /usr/local/include/
```

nodejs: [localhost](http://localhost:4000/)

### hexo

``` bash
$ node --version
$ npm --version
$ npm install -g hexo
```
